topic.title: How to Make a Caramel Frappe

shortdesc.p: This delightful drink will certainly wake you up!

topic.title: How to Make Freshly-Squeezed Orange Juice

shortdesc.p: This bright citrus drink will awaken your senses and propell you into the start of your day!

topic.title: How to Make a Tofu Veggie Omelet

shortdesc.p: This omelet definitely packs a punch. With no meat, but plenty of flavor, this is a great way to begin your day.

shortdesc.p: A breakfast is both easy to make and filling.

shortdesc.p: Waffles are an excellent way to start your day. These delicious Blueberry Waffles are both healthy and easy to make.

shortdesc.p: Wants something filling but healthy? This Vegan Breakfast Hash will certainly do the job.
